author: Admin
title: For Sale / Rent Apartment 1Park Avenue South Jakarta -2 / 3 BR Semi & Fully Furnished
text: - Apartment Name: 1Park Avenue - Location: Jl. K.H Syafi’i Hadzami, Gandaria, Kebayoran Lama, South Jakarta - Tower/Floor/View: All Tower / All Floor / All View - Size: 137.5 / 146.5 / 177 sqm - Bedroom: 2 / 3 - Bathroom: 2 - Study Room: 1* - Maid Room: 1 - Maid Bathroom: 1 - Condition: Semi Furnished / Fully Furnished - Facility: - Tennis, Basket Ball, and Mini Soccer Court (3 in 1) - Fitness - Aerobic and yoga center - Sauna & steam - Games room (Billiard & Table Score) - Children playground - Business center - BBQ area - Cooking class - Multifunction room - Swimming pool - Jogging track - Cinema & karaoke room - Mini Market - Papaya Fresh Gallery (In 1Park Residences) - Restaurant Sumibi (Japan Food) - Daiso (In 1Park Residences) - Starbucks Coffe (In 1Park Residences) - Additional Info: - Brand New Lux Apartment 1Park Avenue at South Jakarta - Strategic and Good Location in Kebayoran Baru - We Have so many choices units to RENT or Buy - For the Price’s Information, Please Call Me Agi (Marketing In House 1Park) at the number provided below - Many units / Many Choice of Units. - We also provide Japanese speaker if you survey the unit, of course, with confirmation that we can provide what you need to meet your needs to the stay in 1Park. - Location on Maps 1Park Avenue https://maps.app.goo.gl/583FeeeqqcLdupWL8 OR Location on Maps 1Park Residences https://goo.gl/maps/CoQbX25aP6ktvBdr8 - Selling Price: - 2 BR (137,5 m2) start from Rp 4.100.000.000 - 2 BR + Study Room (146,5 m2) start from Rp 4.500.000.000 - 3 BR (177 m2) start from Rp 6.200.000.000 - All prices are negotiable - Rental Price: - 2 BR (137,5 m2) start from $ 1600 – $ 1800/month - 2 BR + Study Room (146,5 m2) start from $ 1800 – $ 2200/month - 3 BR (177 m2) start from $ 2300 – $ 2700/month - All prices are negotiable - Contact: Many units/Many Choice of Units (Paling Banyak unit/Paling Banyak Pilihan Unit) AGI (Marketing In House 1Park) 0811 95 65 95 0816 95 65 95 0818 95 65 99 - WhatsApp: [0811956595](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=+62811956595&text=Hallo,%20ada%20yang%20ingin%20saya%20tanyakan%20mengenai%20apartemen%20yang%20diiklankan%20di%20situs%20Jual-Apartemen.com) - E-mail: [agi.agenproperti@gmail.com](mailto:agi.agenproperti@gmail.com)
